synopsis.text: Can Akino satisfy the whims of her exclusive clientele and keep her job at the prestigious Hokkyoku Department Store? As a trainee concierge, she must navigate the challenges of catering to a diverse group of animal customers, including extinct species like the sea mink and Japanese wolf. With the store's strict "no" policy and the watchful eyes of her floor manager and senior concierges, Akino must go above and beyond to fulfill the needs of her customers, from tracking down hard-to-find merchandise to helping with matters of the heart. Will her dedication to customer satisfaction be enough to succeed in this unique retail environment, or will the pressures of the job prove to be too much for her to handle? Only time will tell in this heartwarming and humorous anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
